data.name: Enter a full postcode in the correct format, for example TF7 5AY or TF75AY
data.value: Rhowch god post llawn yn y fformat cywir, er enghraifft TF7 5AY neu TF75AY

data.name: Enter a phone number, like 01632 960 001 or 07700 900 982
data.value: Rhowch rif ffôn, fel 01632 960 001 neu 07700 900 982

data.name: Enter a postcode
data.value: Rhowch god post

data.name: Enter a postcode in England, Scotland or Wales
data.value: Rhowch god post yng Nghymru, Lloegr neu'r Alban

data.name: Enter your full name
data.value: Rhowch eich enw llawn

data.name: Enter your phone number
data.value: Rhowch eich rhif ffôn

data.name: Tell us if your details are correct
data.value: Dwedwch a yw eich manylion chi’n gywir

data.name: Tell us if your pet is male or female
data.value: Dwedwch a yw'ch anifail anwes yn wryw ynteu'n fenyw

data.name: Tell us if you are taking a pet dog, cat or ferret
data.value: Dwedwch a ydych chi'n mynd â chi anwes, cath anwes neu ffured anwes

data.name: Enter your full name, using 300 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch eich enw llawn, gan ddefnyddio 300 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Select your address from the list
data.value: Dewiswch eich cyfeiriad o blith y rhestr

data.name: Enter a county using 100 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch sir gan ddefnyddio 100 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Enter your town or city
data.value: Rhowch dref neu ddinas

data.name: Enter your town or city using 250 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch dref neu ddinas gan ddefnyddio 250 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Enter line 1 of your address
data.value: Rhowch linell 1 eich cyfeiriad

data.name: Enter line 1 of your address using 250 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch linell 1 eich cyfeiriad gan ddefnyddio 250 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Enter line 2 of your address using 250 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch linell 2 eich cyfeiriad gan ddefnyddio 250 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Enter a breed using 150 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch frid gan ddefnyddio 150 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Select or enter the breed of your pet
data.value: Dewiswch frid neu rhowch frid eich anifail anwes

data.name: Enter a date in the correct format, for example 11 4 2021
data.value: Rhowch ddyddiad yn y fformat cywir, er enghraifft 11 4 2021

data.name: Enter a date that is after the pet’s date of birth
data.value: Rhowch ddyddiad sydd ar ôl dyddiad geni'r anifail anwes

data.name: Enter a date that is in the past
data.value: Rhowch ddyddiad sydd yn y gorffennol

data.name: Enter a date that is less than 34 years ago
data.value: Nodwch ddyddiad sy’n llai na 34 mlynedd yn ôl

data.name: Enter your pet's name
data.value: Rhowch enw eich anifail anwes

data.name: Enter your pet's name, using 300 characters or less
data.value: Rhowch enw anifail anwes gan ddefnyddio 300 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Describe the main colour of your cat
data.value: Disgrifiwch brif liw eich cath

data.name: Describe the main colour of your cat, using 150 characters or less
data.value: Disgrifiwch brif liw eich cath, gan ddefnyddio 150 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Describe the main colour of your dog
data.value: Disgrifiwch brif liw eich ci

data.name: Describe the main colour of your dog, using 150 characters or less
data.value: Disgrifiwch brif liw eich ci, gan ddefnyddio 150 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Describe the main colour of your ferret
data.value: Disgrifiwch brif liw eich ffured

data.name: Describe the main colour of your ferret, using 150 characters or less
data.value: Disgrifiwch brif liw eich ffured, gan ddefnyddio 150 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Enter your pet's microchip number in the correct format
data.value: Rhowch rif microsglodyn eich anifail anwes yn y fformat cywir

data.name: Enter your pet’s 15-digit microchip number
data.value: Rhowch rif microsglodyn 15 digid eich anifail anwes

data.name: Enter your pet’s 15-digit microchip number – do not use spaces or special characters like hyphens or dashes
data.value: Rhowch rif microsglodyn 15 digid eich anifail anwes – peidiwch â defnyddio bylchau na chymeriadau arbennig fel cysylltnod neu linell

data.name: Tell us if your pet is microchipped
data.value: Dwedwch a oes gan eich anifail anwes ficrosglodyn

data.name: The microchip number is associated with another lifelong pet travel document
data.value: Mae rhif y microsglodyn yn gysylltiedig â dogfen deithio gydol oes arall i anifail anwes.

data.name: There is a problem
data.value: Mae yna broblem

data.name: Enter a 15-digit number, using only numbers
data.value: Rhowch rif 15 digid, gan ddefnyddio rhifau yn unig

data.name: Enter your pet's microchip number
data.value: Rhowch rif microsglodyn eich anifail anwes

data.name: Select the main colour of your cat
data.value: Dewiswch brif liw eich cath

data.name: Select the main colour of your dog
data.value: Dewiswch brif liw eich ci

data.name: Select the main colour of your ferret
data.value: Dewiswch brif liw eich ffured

data.name: Describe your pet's significant feature
data.value: Disgrifiwch nodwedd arwyddocaol eich anifail anwes

data.name: Describe your pet's significant feature, using 300 characters or less
data.value: Disgrifiwch nodwedd arwyddocaol eich anifail anwes, gan ddefnyddio 300 o gymeriadau neu lai

data.name: Tell us if your pet has any significant features
data.value: Dwedwch a oes gan eich anifail anwes unrhyw nodweddion arwyddocaol

data.name: Enter a date that is before the pet’s microchip date
data.value: Rhowch ddyddiad sydd cyn rhif microsglodyn yr anifail anwes
